items.name: Shaper's Touch
enchantMods: Trigger Commandment of Blades on Hit
implicitMods: Curse Enemies with Elemental Weakness on Hit
explicitMods: 2% increased Melee Physical Damage per 10 Dexterity
flavourText: By my hand, the inert is given life.
By my hand, that which rots is reborn.
There is nothing that cannot be changed.
Nothing.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill gem. Once this gem reaches level 2 or above, will raise the quality of supported gems. Cannot support skills that don't come from gems.
explicitMods: +24% to Quality of Supported Skill Gems
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports aura skills that reserve life or mana to create auras around you.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have 20% reduced Area of Effect
Supported Skills have 19% increased Aura effect
Non-Curse Auras from Supported Skills have 10% increased Effect

Supported Skills also count as Blessing Skills
You can only have one Aura on you from your Blessing Skills
Your Non-Blessing Skills which Reserve Mana are Disabled while you have an Aura from a Supported Skill on you
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants bonuses to damage and critical strike chance of spells to you and your allies, and gives a chance to create Consecrated Ground against stronger enemies.
explicitMods: You and nearby Non-Minion Allies have a 10% chance to create Consecrated Ground on Hitting a Rare or Unique Enemy, lasting 8 seconds
You and nearby Allies have +2% to Critical Strike Multiplier
You and nearby allies have 40% increased Spell Critical Strike Chance
You and nearby allies deal 16% more Spell Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

properties.name: Spell, Movement, Duration, Cold, Travel, Blink, AoE

socketedItems.secDescrText: Teleport to a location, damaging enemies and leaving Chilled ground in an area at both ends of the teleport. Shares a cooldown with other Blink skills.
explicitMods:
20% increased Cooldown Recovery Rate for each Normal or Magic Enemy in Area
140% increased Cooldown Recovery Rate for each Rare or Unique Enemy in Area
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Atziri's Promise
explicitMods: Gain 8% of Elemental Damage as Extra Chaos Damage during effect
2% of Chaos Damage Leeched as Life during Effect
Gain 7% of Physical Damage as Extra Chaos Damage during effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: "Death needs not your understanding. It needs only your loyalty."
- Atziri, Queen of the Vaal

items.name: Morbid Braid
flavourText: When we free ourselves from the shackles
of civilised existence
we learn to feed and run and breathe
as the First Ones have always done.
- The Wolven King

items.name: Mj√∂lner
explicitMods:
Trigger a Socketed Lightning Spell on Hit, with a 0.25 second Cooldown
Socketed Lightning Spells have no Cost if Triggered
flavourText: Look the storm in the eye and you will have its respect.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Deals lightning damage based upon your missing mana in a circular area around the targeted location, as well as in four rectangular extensions whose lengths depend upon your remaining mana.
explicitMods:
Deals base Lightning Damage equal to 45% of missing Unreserved Mana
+6 to length per 25% of Unreserved maximum Mana you have
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill that hits enemies, making those hits penetrate enemy lightning resistance.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have 10% chance to inflict Lightning Exposure on Hit
Supported Skills deal 10% increased Lightning Damage
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

enchantMods: Used when you Use a Guard Skill
explicitMods: Chaos Damage taken does not bypass Energy Shield during effect

Removes all but one Life on use
Removed life is Regenerated as Energy Shield over 2 seconds
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: Let blood sear in your veins,
Let the pain push outwards and turn away your enemy's blows.

items.name: Doom Span
enchantMods: 10% increased Movement Speed if you haven't been Hit Recently

socketedItems.secDescrText: Each supported spell will track how much mana you spend on it, granting a buff when the total mana spent reaches a threshold. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps, mines or skills with a reservation.
explicitMods:
Gain Arcane Surge after Spending a total of 400 Mana on
Upfront Costs and Effects of a Supported Skill

Arcane Surge grants 20% increased Cast Speed
Arcane Surge grants 70% increased Mana Regeneration rate
Supported Skills deal 25% more Spell Damage while you have Arcane Surge

socketedItems.secDescrText: Spends a portion of your mana to grant a buff that takes some of the damage from hits for you until depleted. The buff grants added lightning damage based on the amount of mana spent by this skill. Shares a cooldown with other Guard skills.
explicitMods:
75% of Damage from Hits is taken from Buff before your Life or Energy Shield
Buff can take Damage equal to Mana Spent by this Skill's effect
Buff grants Added Lightning Damage equal to 15% of Mana Spent by this Skill's effect
This Skill's Cooldown does not recover during its effect
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

explicitMods: +7% to Quality of Socketed Support Gems
Socketed Support Gems can also Support Skills from your Main Hand
flavourText: Judge not the weak, for
they empower the strong.

the mind's limits end.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Grants a buff which lets you deal more physical damage.
